en-US.title: Cribnosh
en-US.subtitle: Order meals from local chefs
en-US.description: Cribnosh connects you with local chefs and home cooks in your area. Discover delicious homemade meals, order from your favorite chefs, and have fresh food delivered to your door. Support local culinary talent and enjoy authentic, home-cooked meals.

en-US.title: Cribnosh
en-US.fullDescription: Cribnosh connects you with local chefs and home cooks in your area. Discover delicious homemade meals, order from your favorite chefs, and have fresh food delivered to your door. Support local culinary talent and enjoy authentic, home-cooked meals.
